channel.title: Others on Minimo
channel.description: Recent content in Others on Minimo

item.title: Configuration File: config.toml
item.description: This is the Minimo’s configuraion file ( config.toml ) file of this site: baseURL = "http://www.example.com" title = "Minimo" # for smart copyright line, leave this blank and check [params.copyright] copyright = "" theme = "minimo" disqusShortname = "maracuya-1" googleAnalytics = "" Paginate = 5 preserveTaxonomyNames = true enableRobotsTXT = true # generate robots.txt # Syntax Highlighting ( https://gohugo.io/content-management/syntax-highlighting/ ) pygmentsCodefences = true enableEmoji = true # Missing translations will default to this content language defaultContentLanguage = "en" [params.
